entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
